casebody.data:
In the Matter of FRED STERN & CO., Inc., Bankrupt; George Rea, Petitioner Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 4, 1926.) No. 149. Louis Marshall and James Marshall, both of New York City, for appellant Zalkin & Cohen, of New York City (Charles J. Lane, Herbert R. Limburg, and Michael H. Cardozo, Jr., all of New York City, of counsel), for trustee in bankruptcy.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The appeal herein is dismissed, and upon petition to revise the order under review is affirmed, with costs.
